meanings.definition: The way in which something is placed or arranged.
meanings.sent1: The dispositions of the books on the shelf were neat and organized.
meanings.sent2: She carefully checked the dispositions of the furniture in the room before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent3: The dispositions of the toys in the playroom seemed to change every time the children played.
meanings.sent4: The dispositions of the stars in the night sky created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The dispositions of the flowers in the garden made it look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: A person's inherent qualities of mind and character.
meanings.sent1: Her friendly and caring dispositions always made people feel comfortable around her.
meanings.sent2: His dispositions towards honesty and integrity were evident in every decision he made.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful and curious dispositions often led to funny situations at home.
meanings.sent4: Her dispositions shone brightly like a beacon of kindness in the community.
meanings.sent5: His dispositions of patience and understanding were truly admirable.

meanings.definition: A person's natural tendency or inclination towards something.
meanings.sent1: His dispositions towards sports were evident from a young age.
meanings.sent2: She had a strong disposition towards music and spent hours practicing every day.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's disposition towards chasing squirrels always made the park visits exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her disposition towards learning new languages was like a sponge soaking up knowledge.
meanings.sent5: His disposition towards adventure led him to explore new places and cultures.
